about_the_game:
Torn Veil is the project of a solo developer, marking my debut in the world of game development. As an indie creator, I’ve poured countless hours into crafting a unique horror experience that challenges conventions and immerses players in a world of mystery and terror.

This game is a labor of love, built with Unreal Engine 5 and inspired by classic psychological horror and sci-fi themes. While it’s my first game, I’ve worked tirelessly to ensure it delivers a polished, memorable experience. Your support means the world to me, and I can’t wait to share this journey with you.

  • Indie Spirit: Torn Veil is a testament to the creativity and dedication of indie developers. It’s a game made by a horror enthusiast, for horror enthusiasts.

  • Community-Driven: As a first-time developer, I’m eager to hear your feedback and grow with the community. Your input will help shape the future of Torn Veil and any projects to come.

  • A Personal Journey: This game represents years of learning, experimentation, and a deep love for storytelling and game design. By supporting Torn Veil, you’re supporting the dreams of an indie developer.

Torn Veil is a first-person psychological horror game that plunges you into a chilling narrative of scientific ambition, moral decay, and the terrifying consequences of playing god. Built in Unreal Engine 5, Torn Veil combines stunning visuals, immersive sound design, and a deeply unsettling atmosphere to deliver an unforgettable horror experience.

You awaken in a dense forest, drawn to a mysterious twin house that feels hauntingly familiar. As you step inside, you’re greeted by an eerie advertisement on a flickering TV:
“Welcome to the future of existence. Your soul is more than a vessel—it’s a resource. Expand your existence. Join the waitlist today. But remember… there’s no turning back.”

The house is a labyrinth of secrets, each room hiding clues to the dark experiments that took place here. Explore the decaying interiors, solve intricate puzzles, and uncover the truth behind the Torn Veil project—a groundbreaking but horrifying attempt to harness the power of the human soul.

As you delve deeper into the basement, you’ll encounter the remnants of the scientists’ experiments:

  • The Crooked Soul: A malevolent entity born from a failed soul transfer, now stalking the halls and feeding on the living.

  • Weeping Angels: Statues that come to life when you look away. Keep your eyes on them—or face a gruesome end.

  • The Maze: A sprawling, ever-shifting labyrinth filled with traps, puzzles, and the lingering echoes of lost souls.

Armed with only a shotgun and your wits, you must survive the horrors of the basement, confront the Crooked Soul, and escape before your soul becomes the next experiment.

  • Immersive Horror: Experience a deeply atmospheric world brought to life with Unreal Engine 5’s cutting-edge graphics, including realistic lighting, shadows, and environmental details.

  • Psychological Terror: Face unnerving enemies, solve mind-bending puzzles, and navigate a narrative that blurs the line between reality and nightmare.

  • Dynamic Gameplay: From tense exploration to heart-pounding chases and brutal combat, Torn Veil keeps you on the edge of your seat.

  • Rich Storytelling: Uncover the tragic tale of the scientists and their families through environmental storytelling, cryptic notes.

Step into the world of Torn Veil and experience a horror game that will leave you questioning the very nature of existence. Are you ready to face the darkness?

Wishlist now and prepare to uncover the secrets of the Torn Veil. Your support as an indie developer means everything—thank you for being part of this journey.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 or AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 Ti or AMD RX 560 (4 GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i5-8400 or AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1660 Ti or AMD RX 580 (6 GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
